sqlMap.select: SELECT SUBSTR(FCLTS_CL_CD,0,1) AS MAIN_FCLTS_CL_CD , MIN(FCLTS_CL_CD_NM) AS MAIN_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE DEPTH_SORT <= '1' GROUP BY FCLTS_CL_CD

/* egovframework.rte.ygpa.gam.fclty.service.GamFcltySpecMngDao_SQL_oracle.selectList */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD , FCLTS_CL_CD_NM , FCLTS_CL_UPPER_CD , DEPTH_SORT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT , LEAF_YN FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND FCLTS_CL_CD LIKE #sMainFcltsDiv# || '%'
AND FCLTS_CL_CD LIKE #sFcltsClCd# || '%'
AND FCLTS_CL_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #sFcltsClCdNm# || '%'
ORDER BY FCLTS_CL_CD )Z ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND FCLTS_CL_CD LIKE #sMainFcltsDiv# || '%'
AND FCLTS_CL_CD LIKE #sFcltsClCd# || '%'
AND FCLTS_CL_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #sFcltsClCdNm# || '%'

SELECT SUBSTR(FCLTS_CL_CD,0,1) AS MAIN_FCLTS_DIV , FCLTS_CL_CD AS ORI_FCLTS_CL_CD , FCLTS_CL_CD , FCLTS_CL_CD_NM , FCLTS_CL_UPPER_CD , DEPTH_SORT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT , LEAF_YN FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = #fcltsClCd#

SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD , FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE 1=1
DEPTH_SORT = $depthSort$
DEPTH_SORT = $depthSort$ -1
FCLTS_CL_CD LIKE #mainFcltsDiv# || '%'

SELECT RPAD( CASE WHEN $depthSort$ <= 4 THEN SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),0,$depthSort$-1) || CASE SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),$depthSort$,1) WHEN '9' THEN 'A' ELSE CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),$depthSort$,1)) + 1) END WHEN $depthSort$ = 5 THEN SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),0,4) || CASE SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),4,1) WHEN '0' THEN LPAD(CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),5,1)) + 1),2,'0') ELSE CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),4,2)) + 1) END WHEN $depthSort$ = 6 THEN SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),0,6) || CASE SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),6,1) WHEN '0' THEN LPAD(CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),7,1)) + 1),2,'0') ELSE CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),6,2)) + 1) END WHEN $depthSort$ = 7 THEN SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),0,8) || CASE SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),8,1) WHEN '0' THEN LPAD(CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),9,1)) + 1),2,'0') ELSE CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(MAX(N.FCLTS_CL_CD),8,2)) + 1) END END ,10, '0') AS NEW_FCLTS_CL_CD FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD , FCLTS_CL_UPPER_CD FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE DEPTH_SORT = $depthSort$ ) N WHERE N.FCLTS_CL_UPPER_CD = #fcltsClUpperCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FCLTS_CL_CD_F ( FCLTS_CL_CD , FCLTS_CL_CD_NM , FCLTS_CL_UPPER_CD , DEPTH_SORT , LEAF_YN , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsClCd# , #fcltsClCdNm# , #fcltsClUpperCd# , $depthSort$ , #leafYn# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_CL_CD_F SET FCLTS_CL_CD = #fcltsClCd# , FCLTS_CL_CD_NM = #fcltsClCdNm# , FCLTS_CL_UPPER_CD = #fcltsClUpperCd# , DEPTH_SORT = #depthSort# , LEAF_YN = #leafYn# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = #oriFcltsClCd#
